vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σαρδόνυξ, ῠχος, ὁ,
(σάρδιον) sardonyx, [NT+4th c.BC+]The stone was called ὄνυξ when the dark ground was simply spotted or streaked with white, but σαρδόνυξ if the different colours were disposed in layers.
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
sardonyx (a variety of agate)
sardonyx, a gem exhibiting the color of the carnelian and the white of the calcedony, intermingled in alternate layers, Rev. 21:20*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: sardónice, ónice (de la variedad del ágata, una piedra semipreciosa de colores variados)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 纏絲瑪瑙, 帶有紅肉瑪腦的紅色與縞瑪腦的白色 (即具有紅白條紋的瑪瑙) (啟 21:20)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 缠丝玛瑙, 带有红肉玛脑的红色与缟玛脑的白色 (即具有红白条纹的玛瑙) (启 21:20)
